description: In what union officials described as Silicon Valley's largest private sector organizing effort, 3,000 private security guards on high tech campuses like Facebook, Cisco and Genentech have won recognition as members of Service Employees International Union-United Service Workers West (SEIU-USWW).
author: organizejs
addresses: Facebook, Bayfront Expressway, Menlo Park, San Mateo County, California, 94025-1246, United States
Cisco Way, East Tasman Drive, Cisco Systems, San Jose, Santa Clara County, California, 95134, United States
Genentech Hall, Roger Evans Terrace, Mission Bay, San Francisco, San Francisco City and County, San Francisco, California, United States
